aadhaar_number_will_not_be_stored: Aadhaar number will not be stored by CARE
create_abha__disclaimer_1.1: I declare that consent of the patient (or guardian or nominee of the patient) is obtained for generation of such ABHA Number as per the
create_abha__disclaimer_2.1: I declare that the Aadhaar Number and demographic details of the patient are shared voluntarily by the patient (or guardian or nominee of the patient) through CARE with NHA for the sole purpose of creation of ABHA Number. The patient understands that such data of the patient will be collected, stored and utilized as per
create_abha__disclaimer_2.3: The patient authorizes NHA to use the Aadhaar number for performing Aadhaar based authentication with UIDAI as per the provisions of Aadhaar Act 2016 for the aforesaid purpose.

mobile_otp_verify_error: Failed to verify mobile number. Please try again later.

abha_address_validation_character_error: Should only contain letters, numbers, underscore(_) or dot(.)
